website_summaries.verdict: This beautiful slate cheese board comes in different sizes to suit your charcuterie-serving needs, as well as white chalk to easily label the types of cheese and meats you are presenting.
pros: Very easy to clean, simply wipe down with a wet cloth
The dark color is a beautiful contrast against your cheeses and appetizers
cons: Due to its fragile nature, there have been reports of the board arriving with a crack

customer_reviews.title: check for flaws
customer_reviews.text: i purchased one in 2017. it recently broke. i ordered a new one and noticed it is allot heavier and stronger. it seems to be reinforced with metal. unfortunately in about 5 places the metal shows through. about one eighth of an inch. i hope that these areas do not continue to grow with wear and the use of cheese knives. came packaged extremely well. no damage in shipping. made in China.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Slate Cheese Board
customer_reviews.text: This slate cheese board is amazing! I would buy it again in a minute. It arrived well packaged so that nothing could harm it. The food safe chalk is packaged in part of the foam packaging so DON'T THROW IT AWAY! Those who said they didn't receive it probably threw it away. I used this to make a beautiful cheese, meat, and fruit plate. Our deli lady told me to freeze it for a few hours first and that worked great. It cleaned up afterward easily. It made a beautiful presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Great value and super cute cheese slate
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I'm obsessed with cheese and frequently asked to make cheese platter as for parties. I ordered this one because it was the least expensive large slate and I was not disappointed. Large enough to accommodate a good assortment of cheeses. Soap stone crayon is easy to use and washes right off (just be careful not to throw it away as it's tucked into the styrofoam packing inside the slate box!). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Definatly Fragile....
customer_reviews.text: Got my slate cheese tray lastnight, so excited to use it on christmas! Unwrapped it to discover it's the perfect size....XL! However inside it's well safe packageing it still chipped off a small corner, as disappointed as I was I am grateful it didn't ruin the whole thing. Slate is a fragile resource so I'm not quick to point fingers at the product, seller or delivery...it's a gamble for sure haha. So a little dab of glue & some tape to temporarily secure it, wash & cover lightly in mineral oil...the fix was hardly noticeable! The little soap chalk was easily found & wrights nicely. I'm so excited for Christmas! I'll post pics when I can!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty awesome slate platter
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty awesome slate platter. I thought the price and size were so great that I bought two! I took off one star because I'm slightly concerned about how durable it is because I noticed small flecks of slate on the counter as I rubbed the chalk off lightly with a dry paper towel. It was minimal and I am not eating off of these, so I'm not super concerned about it at the moment. These a wonderful table pieces if you like writing or drawing things as changeable art.
customer_reviews.author: R. Friend

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.text: The extra large size was perfect for assembling a charcuterie board for a crowd. It was very well packaged and needs to be handled with care when washing or storing. It's very pretty, easy to clean and doesn't need the maintenance a wooden board requires. The slate is a great background color to show off the various foods on the board. Upon receiving one needs to sand the edges lightly to shed some lingering slate particles where the cuts were made or you will find shavings on your serving surfaces or possibly your food. It's not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: Adadreaming

customer_reviews.title: I was shipped someone elses broken return. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a NEW item and definitely received an old return that had a sticky note on the inside from the previous customer stating that it was "Also, Already Broken"
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Every one is unique
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. We use them on our bar cart to display glasses. The only thing I would note is that every one is unique. One of ours is thick and has really cool edges that we love, the other is extremely thin so you can barely even see the edges. For us, it doesn't matter that they're different, but if you want 2 thick identical ones, there's no guarantee you'll get that. Also, the chalk was included and had a bright piece of yellow tape on it so the company must've fixed that flaw (I noticed a lot of people saying they couldn't find the chalk.)
customer_reviews.author: Don Schrieber

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: These came the other day. The packaging was really good and there wasn’t any damage. They cane quickly so I experienced no problems with that. I had ordered some others but they were a little too big to use as placemats. These a little small but will work better on my table. I gave the durability 4 stars only because they are a little thin and might break but so far they are great and I’m real happy. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The slate is beautiful and a wonderful way to serve up cheeses, grapes, apples, crackers and spreads. I gave this as a gift to my son for hosting Christmas Eve in his first house and put it all together with some various cheese knives. Pretty to display even when not in use. It was shipped to me packaged carefully and on time. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: terri klein

customer_reviews.title: A gift that was a big hit.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift. It was impressive and classy. I gave It 5 stars even though the chalk was missing from the packaging, because the board is that nice. I loved the fact that you can write the names of your cheeses or appetizers on it or a holiday greeting. Would look nice very displayed in the kitchen on a stand when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Tori C.

customer_reviews.title: Read great reviews on this board
customer_reviews.text: Read great reviews on this board, and they definitely were great. Brought this out at a party yesterday and everyone really enjoyed how nice it looked and the ability to write on it. We were originally concerned it would be too big, but honestly, once you put a few different meats and cheeses on it, you'll find you wish it were bigger. I only wish it came with more than one piece of chalk. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find the chalk. Look under the yellow tape, it's there! I failed to look under the tape so I emailed Stone Age that it wasn't included. Lewis responded in a matter of a few hours that he would send me other. I found and thought I canceled him sending me another. Got another today! That said, I love the slate! I got the 12' x 16". I haven't used it yet, but looking forward to it. The product is as described. I liked to also add that it is very substantial in weight to!
customer_reviews.author: travelingirl

customer_reviews.title: Great wedding, housewarming or hostess gift
customer_reviews.text: These are beautifully designed and timeless serving platters for meats, cheeses, breads and condiments. They make a casual get together look like a party. They make great housewarming or hostess gifts. I will be pairing the slate board with a small cutting board and cheese utensils for a casual wedding gift this summer. The natural charcoal slate is classic and will suit any event or décor. I recommend them without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The company cares enough to take the extra steps in packaging it's product, which is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as an early Christmas gift. It arrived extremely well packaged, very protected. Not a chip or crack to be had. It is a beautiful piece and large enough to set out various types of cheeses, jams, & fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Windygail

customer_reviews.title: Get so many compliments.
customer_reviews.text: With all the slate items, be careful. You don't want to be rough with them. I actually kept the styrafoam packing and have them inbetween the coasters when not in use. Even though they have little rubber feet, I don't want to take the chance of chipping them. BUT - they are great. Love them so much more than any other coasters I have ever had. Get so many compliments. If I had to do all over again, would order again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M. Odell

customer_reviews.title: I used these for photo backgrounds and they work great.
customer_reviews.text: The granite was a perfect picture background that I purchased these for. I actually ordered 2 I like them so much and they are great for table centerpieces when I am not using them, so they have a dual purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Stone Age Slate folks provided the most awesome customer service! When my board arrived with a significant scratch on it, I contacted them and they immediately had a new one sent which arrived in time for a party I was using it for. The replacement slate board is perfect and absolutely beautiful. Thank you Stone Age Slate!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Seivertson

customer_reviews.title: Simple, clean and effective
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a wine/cheese party and it was the perfect size for 4 types of cheese, crackers, nuts, fruit etc. Cleaned up easy enough and stores on edge in a bookcase. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous slate!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I’ve been wanting one forever and when I saw the price for this I couldn’t resist! It’s exactly as described, no complaints. Going to buy a couple more either for gifts...or for myself?! Anyway highly recommend, very happy with this purchase. The slate is as expected and the chalk writes really well. Simply gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: BlessedSunflower

customer_reviews.title: Great Packaging, Terrific Size!
customer_reviews.text: This came packaged superbly! I was a little concerned that it might come cracked, but it was packaged so well, I think that might have been impossible! The size was great. I don’t know if one was offered with handles, but I wish I would have looked. Because of the large size of this I would have liked handles. This was a Christmas gift and I HAVE seen pictures of it in use and the gift recipient loved it!
customer_reviews.author: dsaintknight

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice slate board., but I didn't use it to serve food; I used it to make a slate cave for my aquarium. It did not arrive broken either. It was well packaged. This would make a great wedding or housewarming gift. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Thoughtfox

customer_reviews.title: They are a great addition to my other serving pieces and I hope ...
customer_reviews.text: The slates are just what I envisioned. They are somewhat fragile...just because they are a stone, however they arrived in one piece. WELL PACKED! There are little "feet" on the bottom so they won't scratch any surface. They also came with a white crayon type stick for writing on the stone. I've kept the original packing for storage. They are a great addition to my other serving pieces and I hope to have them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cheese board
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! This cheese board looks very sharp and the chalk is thin making it easy to write with (so your cheese labels look lovely even if you are not skilled at calligraphy). This is a slate board, so the edges chip. However, the edges are rustic looking already so new chips are not noticeable. I recommend storing it with a soft cloth covering.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Brown

customer_reviews.title: ... try the Stone Age Slate Board and I'm so happy that I did because I really like it
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try the Stone Age Slate Board and I'm so happy that I did because I really like it. It looks great presented with various cheeses and I placed a small dish of olives in the corner. I love that I can write the names of the cheese right on the slate with chalk, fun! I would recommend buying from Stone Age also because they followed up with me regarding delivery of the product which means they have excellent customer service a plus these days.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Jane

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for my niece. She and her boyfriend frequently have college friends visiting from out of town and I thought this would be perfect to go with a cheese knife set I purchase elsewhere. After the holidays I'm going to order one for myself. It's that well made and will look perfect with my decor. The shipping package was more than adequate and everything arrived in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Thistle Sailor

customer_reviews.title: The perfect piece to showcase a large charcuterie display!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large (14" x 20") slate platter to use for a charcuterie display. It held a large selection of cheeses, meats, dried fruits and nuts and looked stunning! I bought it for myself, but realized this will be my go-to gift in the future. It's well made, beautiful and functional. BTW: It was padded really well for shipping so the large slate platter arrived in one piece with no breakage.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Great cheeseboard. Perfect for entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Great size cheeseboard. Writing on it with chalk is a nice touch, perfect for when you're entertaining guests. Appreciate the company personally reaching out to ensure it was delivered in one piece. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roy D

customer_reviews.title: Board for cheese, buy this
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, as ordered and the seller was polite enough to ask if f it had arrived intact. Great product and service
customer_reviews.author: Scott Allinson

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Amazing product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I had few drops of oil on it and i tried things to clean it but i can still see the marks. Overall good product Update: Within 24 hour of this review, I received an email about how to clean the oil drop. Great customer service. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Aedy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition to the Wine & Food Accessories
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and exceptional customer service- the quality is better than many similar models I’ve seen in department stores or bed bath and beyond; at a far better price. We’re using it for wine and food pairings - day of delivery, it was already a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Looks great; classy addition to any buffet / appetizer counter
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two slates to use for our annual Christmas Eve party with family and friends. My wife absolutely loves the slates. They look classy and high-end, have good weight to them without being too heavy, and looked really nice sitting out on our buffet / appetizer counter. Would definitely recommend these. Suggest you wash them with warm, slightly soapy water before using them, but that's just good hygiene, nothing to do with the slates themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff H.

customer_reviews.title: Bet you'll like this, I do.
customer_reviews.text: Slate came undamaged and well packaged (inside of a box that was inside of another which inside yet another box, all wrapped up carefully). Product of decent thickness, not too thin to make it fragile, yet not so thick to make it weigh too much. Extra large size works great for our charcuterie spreads or gives enough room for some larger items with labels on the slate (product came with a nice small piece of chalk to write on the slate with). All-in-all, happy with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Grabman

customer_reviews.title: It’s a perfect size, is pretty and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted a slate cheeseboard forever, and this one totally met my needs. It’s a perfect size, is pretty and sturdy, and was packed incredibly well. Someone else posted that they display theirs when not in use, and I have borrowed the idea, writing something fun or inspirational on it for the week. A good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: cool concept for cheese lovers
customer_reviews.text: this is a cool concept and good way to keep track of what you're eating if you like trying a bunch of cheeses at once. it's really big and heavy tho
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for someone who likes to entertain
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for someone who likes to entertain. It was packed really well with extra padding to ensure that the board didn't crack during delivery. It's super light and easy to clean. I recommend getting some chalkboard cheese markers from Crate & Barrel to go with your board. It makes a cute set.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: I had 4 cheese varieties displayed and could have easily added more
customer_reviews.text: Even though the dimensions were listed, I was still impressed with the size. I had 4 cheese varieties displayed and could have easily added more. It is beautiful, functional and I received a lot of compliments! What a fun entertaining piece! I bought extra for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: This is so cool. Worked great for our party
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool. Worked great for our party. Like any slate it can get slightly discolored from certain jams/jellys...so suggest you apply a good stone sealer if that sort of thing bother's you. Aim2Trade is an awesome seller with great follow-up. They really want you to like this product...and we certainly do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this platter
customer_reviews.text: Love this platter!!! I fit more than I expected to be able to on it. It's pretty thin so it's not too bulky to store and not as heavy as you would expect --- in a good way. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: LCC

customer_reviews.title: Simple and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cheese board! It's very simple, and I love that you can write on it. It came in one piece with the chalk taped in one of the pieces of foam.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: These slate boards are great! Great price for a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look.
customer_reviews.text: Great display setting. No chalk however did not miss that. Perfect size for assorted cheeses and meats.
customer_reviews.author: G. Masters

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Gift
customer_reviews.text: Couple was happy. They host a lot at their home.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Carswell

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY AWESOME !!!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY AWESOME !!!! It was exactly what I was looking for and what I wanted to give my mom as a gift. She loves it. Plus the seller wrote us a wonderful note, so sweet!! Only down side is that it is difficult to wash the chalk but as long as you hand wash it verses machine you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kris13

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic product - just like what you’d find at West ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic product - just like what you’d find at West Elm, Pottery Barn, etc. Company even contacted us to make sure we were happy with the purchase and proactively reached out given some previous shipping issues with other customers. Great product, great value, great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple Elegance
customer_reviews.text: I like the organic look of slate and these have that simple elegance as coasters, I look forward to getting slate plates in the future. Very cool for a small party.
customer_reviews.author: FancyFlower

customer_reviews.title: Good packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to order this because I assumed it would be damaged during the delivery. They pack the heck out of it and it was delivered safe and sound. Nice big platter- will be able to do a great cheese presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Will make an excellent cheese platter for my next dinner party
customer_reviews.text: The slate arrived within 2 days of ordering it, and was exactly what I was hoping it would be. Will make an excellent cheese platter for my next dinner party.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Pinder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cheeseboard
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to purchasing a handsome cheeseboard and this fits the bill. Large size enables me to present a variety of cheeses and accompaniments. The feet on the bottom are nice add on. Can't go wrong with this item!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: This looks very nice. I bought as a gift for my daughter. I comes packaged very securely. I may reorder one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: JKND

customer_reviews.title: Differnt kind of gift
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, excellent quality piece of slate. It comes packaged beautiful, no chips or breaks. I am excited to give this as a gift this Christmas to my son who makes his own sushi. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: R. Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing, works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking cheese board, and I love the white crayon that lets you write what type of cheese is on each part of the board. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wozniak

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Perfect for my wine and cheese party
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Perfect for my wine and cheese party. Great price and quality. Also it was shipped very securely. This company cares about it's products and makes sure it makes it through delivery without getting broken or chipped. I Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Good quality & perfect for a wedding shower I hosted. Can’t wait to use it more! I got many compliments on it & the decicious treats I was sble to put on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s great. Just be aware that it’s hard to clean perfectly with no stains.
customer_reviews.author: Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Thank you.
customer_reviews.text: I was dissatisfied and they promptly gave me a refund.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Glad I went with the large size!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend as a Christmas present, as we’re learning to be charcuterie snobs. It worked out perfectly as we were in charge for appetizers on the holiday. The fam was impressed - and will be buying one for themselves. Can’t wait to show off some more knowledge! (No chalk was included, but that’s easy enough to come by.)
customer_reviews.author: Kayla S

customer_reviews.title: Useful and well made.
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and light. I got the 2 placemat size for cheese.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous pieces
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition and expertly packed with plenty of foam. Gorgeous slate, a bit more durable and thick than I had imagined - which is great! Don't think it'll break any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great cheese board
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice presentation for cheese. It's sturdy plus extra roomy for several varieties of cheese. Your guests will be impressed!
customer_reviews.author: JRD

customer_reviews.title: This is item looks exactly like the picture and it is perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is item looks exactly like the picture and it is perfect. . It arrived with no issues. This is a great item while it is large it was packed securely and arrived in one piece it will be wonderful to use at parties.
customer_reviews.author: Kepp

customer_reviews.title: This is a strong piece...dont let it looking too thin fool you.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used this one...is a Christmas gift bought early
customer_reviews.author: Claudine Moss

customer_reviews.title: Great service, great product
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a cheese slate and found this on on Amazon. Great service, great product! Can't wait to put it to good use.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece of slat but keep in mind it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece of slat but keep in mind it is not super thick so very easy to chip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the large slate charcuterie tray
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the large slate charcuterie tray! We used this past Saturday and received so many comments on how nice it was! I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent service.
customer_reviews.text: The product is great quality and came wrapped with amazing care to avoid any breaks. It’s wxactly as advertised, great value and excellent customer service. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tameressam

customer_reviews.title: Makes a really nice display for your cheeses
customer_reviews.text: Makes a really nice display for your cheeses. I love that I can write the cheese name right on the board. I bought the Royal Casa Cheese Markers set, but don't think I will use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Young

customer_reviews.title: Great piece!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece, love the versatility of the slate. It has four pads on the bottom that keep it from scratching the surface of out granite. Shipping was perfect, very well packed and was not damaged at all.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moretti

customer_reviews.title: it broke at 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: I received the item on May 1st and used it once until May 4th when at 2nd use it broke. For a sandstone, not very durable. Don’t recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: ANDRADA R POPESCU

customer_reviews.title: I love this board
customer_reviews.text: Really cool board, I love using it when I'm hosting parties. Good price good quality. I like
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to Entertain With
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and craftsmanship of this cheese board. It looks wonderful filled with my favorite cheeses and I have received many compliments. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kumaskids

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service
customer_reviews.text: The slate is beautiful and exactly what we wanted. I really appreciated the communication from the seller and checking to make sure it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I literally make meat and cheese plates every night I love this board so much words do not do it justice 😍❤💋
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of these but obe is almost half the thickness of the other and it leaves chips on the counter
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Great Cheese Board
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful board, though essentially just a slab of slate. Great size for a good cheese spread. Did not come with chalk.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: Photographer's Dream
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Photographer and have used it several times for food and soon for another shoot where people will be holding it. TOTALLY well worth it and exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This extra large slate is perfect for 3 wedges of cheese
customer_reviews.text: This extra large slate is perfect for 3 wedges of cheese, nuts, dried fruits and a good drizzle of honey. The rubber feet are great for anchoring to the granite counter top and it cleans up beautifully. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with these slate placemats. They were as expected and will work well for what I need, which is as a display tray for food photography.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Really cute Charcuterie board
customer_reviews.text: This product came as advertised. It will look hreat at my dinner parties. Most impressed that the owners reached out to make sure it arrived ok.
customer_reviews.author: C wood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these and they are beautiful. They were carefully packaged and arrived safe and sound.
customer_reviews.author: King Family

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I got the x large one! It is absolutely amazing. It’s big enough to put a huge array of appetizers on. It came so well packaged it was safe and secure. I would definitely recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It arrived as expected and in time for it's first dinner party, where it was a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Tomczuk

customer_reviews.title: Misleading/changing listing
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the item I ordered. The original listing was for a 12x24 slate board. Now, the listing is for 12x16. The board I received is slightly smaller than that even.
customer_reviews.author: john belcher

customer_reviews.title: Extra Large Stone Age Slate Board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this slate board for a Christmas gift. I know she will love it. I didn’t receive the chalk that I understood would be included in the order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No soapstone was with the package.
customer_reviews.text: The Soapstone Pen did not come with the package like it claimed. I was really bummed that it did not arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 to give as holiday presents. They just arrived today, well packed and in perfect condition. The slate is attractive and seems sturdy. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful and has a great weight to it. We have been trying to find reasons to use it as often as possible since it arrived--it makes dinner and snacking more fun. But what is the best way to clean it? I can't seem to rid marks from cheese sitting on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The slate cheeseboard was exactly what I hoped :-) It came very promptly and was very well-packed. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Calum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parties!

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy / Carefully packed
customer_reviews.text: Nice, heavy, sturdy slate. It was shipped in a very carefully packed box with extra padding. They even emailed to make sure it arrived in one piece. Great experience!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful... Beautiful... Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, well made platter backed by amazing customer service. I will purchase from these guys again. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 14X20 slate platter for my sister and it is beautiful. It was very well packaged and arrived quickly. I would definitely purchase again!

product_meta.title: 4 Sizes to Choose: Large Stone Age Slate cheese boards (12"x16" Serving Platter) with Soap Stone Chalk
product_meta.description:
Size:12"x16" TrayOur slate platter is a proven success. Our customers say things like:

-Everything you need can be displayed and labeled on this amazing slate board. 
- Bought this for a gift and the recipient was very thrilled.
- Ordered 3 to give as holiday presents. They just arrived today, well packed and in perfect condition. The slate is attractive and seems sturdy. Very happy with the purchase. 

Read more reviews below...
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY BLACK SLATE TRAY - with rubber pads underneath to prevent scratching | Natural one-of-a-kind serving piece for charcuterie and wine.
WE STAND BEHIND THE QUALITY OF OUR CHEESE BOARDS - should you ever have an issue where the board arrives broken, or breaks due to no fault of you own, we will replace it 100% free of charge
PERFECT SIZE SERVER - 16" x 12" x 0.3 inch is the perfect size for any kitchen, party table, or gathering of loved ones. Easy to clean and reuse for many years to come and doesn’t age
NATURAL STONE SLATE - means its food safe, and the perfect board for meat, cheese, pastry, olive etc.
BEAUTIFUL FOR ANY DINNER PARTY - Receive complement after complement from your party guests surrounding this beautiful cheese board platter with cutlery set that is on the cuttiing edge of fashion
